name: Modern Backpack
description: This backpack is perfect for everyday use. It has a padded laptop compartment and plenty of pockets for all your essentials.

name: Smart Watch
description: Stay connected with this sleek smart watch. It has a heart rate monitor, GPS, and a large display.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: Enjoy your music without the hassle of cords with these wireless headphones. They have a long battery life and are perfect for travel.

name: Sunglasses
description: Protect your eyes from the sun with these stylish sunglasses. They have polarized lenses and come in a variety of colors.

name: Running Shoes
description: This pair of shoes features a mesh upper with a stylish design and a simple color and silhouette that makes it easy to match with a variety of outfits.

name: Basic T-Shirt
description: This basic t-shirt is a wardrobe essential. It is made from soft cotton and has a comfortable fit.
